channel.title: Jane Kellock on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Jane Kellock on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Mindfulness in practice
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm SG - Sandra Gyalsten JK - Jane Kellock MD In this episode, Iriss.fm hears from Sandra Gyalsten, Learning and Development officer at Dumfries and Galloway Council and Jane Kellock, Senior Manager of Children and Early Intervention at West Lothian Council on the subject of mindfulness and its application to Social Services practice. Firstly they gave us some background on their interest in the subject and define what mindfulness is.
